Package ictk.boardgame.ui

The UI package contains interfaces for various types of displays.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BoardDisplay This is a visual representation of a board.
 

Package ictk.boardgame.ui Description

The UI package contains interfaces for various types of displays. The most common are GUI (Graphic User Interface) and CLI (Command Line Interface. Classes here are unlikely, as not many widgets can be used for mulitple games.
